short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beautifully crafted sidepanel for you to take notes anywhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flowtide Notes is a beautifully-crafted sidepanel for you to take notes. Flowtide Notes works wherever you are, on the side ready to take notes.
